name: Lose Your Marbles
notes:
A MIDI synthesizer, such as QSynth, and a soundfont, such as Fluid R3 GM, are required for music playback.
ipxemu is used for IPX emulation.
content:
files:
- ipxemu:
    filename: ipxemu-1.0.4.zip
    referer: https://sourceforge.net/projects/ipxemu/files/ipxemu-1.0.4/ipxemu-1.0.4.zip/download
    url: https://liquidtelecom.dl.sourceforge.net/project/ipxemu/ipxemu-1.0.4/ipxemu-1.0.4.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/SegaSoft/Lose Your Marbles/marbles.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: otto.exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix...
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win95
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: directplay
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Lose Your Marbles...
    executable: $DISC/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/SegaSoft/Lose Your Marbles/
    file: ipxemu
    format: zip
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 640x480
  dxvk: false
  overrides:
    wsock32.dll: n
